src/scale/helper.js
在这个文件中找到 intervalScaleNiceTicks 方法，他会返回 精度信息、最小值和最大值。
最近我也是需要在chart外面获取刻度，做外部单位换算时才去找的。
如果你在外面用，你完全可以把这个方法提取出来，他里面有几个number工具的依赖，一起拿出来。

>           Confirmed that this is a bug caused by SVG transform with clipPath. I'm afraid it should take some time to be fixed since it's not very easy to fix it.
It is a obvious bug for pie chart. It is better to fix it quickly.

Hi, any update for this?

There is another question, how to detect left or right boundary of chart is reached when user scrolling charts on mobile devices ? Currently, I'm  listening `datazoom` event to calculate the distance, but it's inaccurate.

Thanks.
@jbadilla  Thanks for answers, but how can I get `yAxis.axisLabels`? Is there any api?
求问解决方案

from the source code, I found, the startAngle and endAngle calculate incorrect in function calRadialBar.And in each series, i set the barWidth: 40.but in the calRadialBar function, only the lastest series barWidth is useable.
In barLayoutPolar function, the variable of columnOffset,is incorrect, and i bug found, the stacks's is calculate incorrect in calRadialBar function.
你给的例子，legend只设置了一个data。legend能不能设置两个data
@luozhining http://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#legend.data
`d.itemStyle.normal.color = 'yellow';`

but  automatically triggered highlight event cannot be triggered event.
For example, when I switch automatically, the mouse moves up. Trigger the default highlight. But did not trigger the highlight event.
So, I think there are other ways to handle the mouseover event.

> 请问dbclick是点击在什么上的？

是双击scatter时触发，用的是echarts.on('dblclick', function (e){})函数

遇到同样问题。
另外能否增加一个功能， link 也可以被筛选。目前没有此功能

resolved by import like below
import "vue-echarts/node_modules/echarts/lib/chart/line";

it is real.
you can set color to `#333333` first.
@roblav96 I have faced the same issue. I've resolved the issue by explicit assigning the `z` option for each chart series.
Fixed in ecomfe/zrender@88b1608cc953a2cb403ac149934bc4dbfede2797

Similar to #5038. 
Needed to be enhanced.
能否提供 option （以及，click 和 dblclick 时设置的 option），不然难于复现问题。

> A tricky way:
> 
> ```js
> option = {
>     series : [
>         {
>             type: 'pie',
>             radius : '55%',
>             data:[
>                 {value:335, name:'AA'},
>                 {value:310, name:'BB'},
>                 {value:234, name:'CC'},
>                 {value:135, name:'DD'},
>                 {value:1548, name:'empty', silent: true, itemStyle: {color: 'rgba(0,0,0,0)'}}
>             ]
>         }
>     ]
> };
> ```

not bad, but still has a question，**can't use 'tooltip' in 'option'**.if i do, the  'empty' tooltip  will be show when i  hover it。anyway,thank you for reply

Does geojson support polyline?
去掉 dataZoom 中的 `filterMode: 'none'` 即可。

`series.type: 'lines'` can be used in cartesian.

<https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/test/lines-grid.html>

<http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xR9ug3y7FY&v=2>
